story_zako_battle_07_01/3701_0101_0100_1: This is the right way to the gathering spot, right?
story_zako_battle_07_01/3701_0101_0200_1:
Aaah, jeez! What a pain in the neck. Why’d you
have to make eye contact with me, huh?
Seriously, give me a break.
story_zako_battle_07_01/3701_0101_0300_1:
Hey! What’re you doing?!
Turn around before they notice you! Jeez!
story_zako_battle_07_01/3701_0101_0400_1:
Well, hello there! Fancy meeting you here...
Would you be interested in a Pokémon battle?
story_zako_battle_07_01/3701_0501_0100_1:
Team Break? I’ve never heard of them, so I can’t
help you there. But I really appreciate you
battling us! Thanks!
story_zako_battle_07_01/3701_0501_0200_1:
Ok! Hurry along home, now! I can only
put up with a pain in my neck for so long...
story_zako_battle_07_01/3702_0101_0200_1:
Finally, some new servants to wait on me!
I do hope you come along... Who knows what’ll
happen to your precious Pokémon if you don’t!
story_zako_battle_07_01/3702_0501_0100_1:
Oh... Are you sure you don’t want to be
my servant? Final answer?
story_zako_battle_07_01/3702_0501_0200_1: No matter! I already have plenty!
story_zako_battle_07_01/3703_0101_0100_1:
Oh? What’s this? Welcome to my cave.
Are you lost?
story_zako_battle_07_01/3703_0101_0200_1:
I looooove Pokémon!
But I hate people....
story_zako_battle_07_01/3703_0101_0300_1: You know what I’m trying to say, right?
story_zako_battle_07_01/3703_0501_0100_1: It’s only natural that I like and dislike things...
story_zako_battle_07_01/3703_0501_0200_1:
But whenever I say that I don’t like something,
some people yell at me...
That’s why I’m going to stay in my cave.
story_zako_battle_07_01/3803_0101_0100_1:
Found ya! Ha ha!
Team Break baddies, comin’ atcha!
story_zako_battle_07_01/3803_0101_0200_1:
I was bad back in school, and I’m still bad now!
Who cares about math when bein’ bad feels
so good!
story_zako_battle_07_01/3803_0101_0300_1:
Yeah! Can you count how many girls are on
this team? That’s right—one!
The same as my average test score!
story_zako_battle_07_01/3803_0101_0400_1:
Bet you think we’re going down the wrong path
don’t you? Well, think again! ’Cause we’re the
aces of bein’ bad!
story_zako_battle_07_01/3803_0501_0100_1: We’ll let you off easy this time!
